comments.content: [Galactic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607090538/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/galactic/) seems to be a good digital adaption.

Good one Jan! I was going to say Beton Extra Bold, but the R didn't match in the version I looked at first.

- Mike Yanega

It wasn’t me. It was WTF.

;-)

Serif fonts are its best 'skill'. Well, good use of resources then.

- Mike Yanega

ChrisL
